content:
We have been informed that the Red Women's Committee in Hamburg will carry out the following event in advance of March 8:

Thursday, March 7th

6:30 p.m.

International Center B5

Brigittenstr. 5 (St. Pauli)

(The event takes place as part of the Tayad Café, together with other groups)
author: rine
description: Internet platform for the development of a revolutionary movement
title: Hamburg: event on March 8th
